metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1828 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Ruby http gem before 0.7.3 does not verify hostnames in SSL connections, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a man-in-the-middle-attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1828` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-http - 1.0.2-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-http package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-2ubuntu2').
